stor::I2OChain

stor::I2OChain Class Reference

List of one or multiple I2O messages representing event fragments. More...

 Returns true if there are no I2O messages (fragments).
bool complete ()
 Returns true if all fragments of an event are available.
void addToChain (I2OChain &)
 Adds fragments from another chain to the current chain taking care that all fragments are chained in the right order.

int id
toolbox::mem::Reference ref

Detailed Description

List of one or multiple I2O messages representing event fragments.

It wraps several toolbox::mem::Reference chained together and assures that the corresponding release methods are called when the last instance of I2OChain goes out of scope.
